Bugün, 6 Şubat depreminin yıl dönümünde, hayatını kaybeden vatandaşlarımızı saygı ve rahmetle anıyor, ailelerine sabır ve dayanma gücü diliyoruz. Bu büyük felaketin acısını yüreğimizde hissederken, dayanışma ve birlik içinde olmanın önemini bir kez daha hatırlıyoruz.

Deprem gerçeğiyle yüzleşmek ve gerekli önlemleri almak, gelecekte benzer acıların yaşanmaması için hayati bir sorumluluktur. Daha güvenli yarınlar için bilinçlenmeye, afetlere karşı hazırlıklı olmaya ve gerekli tedbirleri almaya devam etmeliyiz.

Bugün, sadece kaybettiklerimizi anma günü değil, aynı zamanda ders çıkarıp daha güvenli bir gelecek inşa etme sorumluluğunu hatırlama günüdür.

———————————————————————

Today marks the anniversary of the February 6 earthquake, and

Today marks the anniversary of the February 6 earthquake, and we remember with respect and compassion those who lost their lives. We extend our deepest condolences to their families and wish them strength and resilience. The pain of this great disaster remains in our hearts, reminding us once again of the importance of unity and solidarity.

Facing the reality of earthquakes and taking necessary precautions is crucial to preventing similar tragedies in the future. We must continue to raise awareness, be prepared for disasters, and take the necessary measures to ensure a safer tomorrow.

Today is not only a day of remembrance for those we lost but also a day to reflect, learn, and commit to building a safer future.

23 Nisan Ulusal Egemenlik ve Çocuk Bayramı kutlu olsun!
Gazi Mustafa Kemal Atatürk’ün çocuklara armağan ettiği bu anlamlı günde, geleceğimizin teminatı olan tüm çocukların neşe, barış ve sevgiyle büyümesini diliyoruz.
———————————————————————————-
Happy April 23rd National Sovereignty and Children’s Day!
On this meaningful day gifted to children by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk, we wish all children — the hope of our future — a life filled with joy, peace, and love.

Today, we honor the relentless spirit of labor and the unshakable bond of solidarity.
To those who shape industries, power economies, and build the future with unwavering effort — Happy International Workers’ Day!
We don’t just work — we lead, we create, and we rise together.

Bugün, emeğin durdurulamaz gücünü ve dayanışmanın sarsılmaz bağını selamlıyoruz.
Sanayiyi şekillendiren, ekonomilere yön veren, geleceği alın teriyle inşa eden tüm emekçilerin 1 Mayıs Emek ve Dayanışma Günü kutlu olsun!
Biz sadece çalışmıyoruz — öncülük ediyor, üretiyor ve birlikte yükseliyoruz.

As part of our ongoing commitment to innovation, Aymas has consistently delivered top-quality and technologically advanced solutions over the years. One significant improvement introduced six years ago is the use of HUNGER brand seal housings in our guided guillotine shearing systems. This enhancement effectively prevents scratches caused by gaps between the shearing blades. As a result, we have statistically increased the operational lifespan of our cylinders by 140%.

Power. Precision. Performance.

Meet the AYMAS Shear Baler — engineered for the toughest challenges in metal recycling.

With cutting forces up to 1350 tons and a capacity reaching 40 tons/hour, this machine is built to process HMS 1 & 2, end-of-life vehicles, pipes, and more — all without an operator.

From sensitive cut length adjustment to remote diagnostics, every feature is designed for efficiency, safety, and durability. Available in electric or diesel, stationary or semi-mobile options — it adapts to your operation, not the other way around.

Chrome-plated shafts, anti-wear plates, and top-tier components ensure reliable, long-term performance even under extreme conditions.

Built strong. Runs smart. Cuts clean.
